entries.title: U.S. to designate Wagner mercenary group  a ‘transnational criminal organization’
entries.description: The U.S. will designate the Russian mercenary Wagner Group as a “significant transnational criminal organization” and impose further sanctions against the organization and its support network next week, the White House said Friday.

entries.title: Police fine U.K. PM Rishi Sunak for failing to wear a seatbelt in Instagram video
entries.description: LONDON — Britain's Prime Minister Rishi Sunak was fined by police Friday, for failing to wear a seatbelt whilst filming a clip for social media in a moving vehicle.

entries.title: Meet the man set to replace Jacinda Ardern as New Zealand PM
entries.description: Chris Hipkins, who played a significant role in New Zealand’s response to the Covid-19 pandemic, is set to replace Jacinda Ardern as prime minister after emerging on Saturday as the only candidate to lead the ruling Labour Party.

entries.title: Over 50 injured as protests cause ‘nationwide chaos’ in Peru
entries.description: Dozens of people were injured after tensions flared again on Friday night as police clashed with protesters in anti-government demonstrations that are spreading across Peru.

entries.title: The purple Wiggle responds to his TikTok heartthrob status: 'It's opened up a new world of followers'
entries.description: John Pearce said he’s flattered by the attention during a Zoom interview with NBC News.  “The last couple days — it’s definitely informed me of my demographic online. It’s great."

entries.title: Leaders at World Economic Forum to face reality of climate change on Swiss slopes
entries.description: The World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, is putting the impacts of climate change on display for world and business leaders as the Alps are lacking snow. NBC’s Keir Simmons reports on why experts are sounding the alarm that Davos’ power players need to use their resources to act.

entries.title: Germany, U.S. fail to reach agreement on sending tanks to Ukraine
entries.description: German and U.S. officials were unable to resolve a dispute over sending battle tanks to Ukraine due to Germany resisting. NBC News’ Richard Engel has the latest on Russia’s war in Ukraine.
